Name: Connected
Description: The connected side of the piece of the connection.

Name: Connecting
Description: The connecting side of the piece of the connection.

Name: Connection
Description: A connection between two pieces in a design.

Name: Connections
Description: The optional connections of a design.

Name: Description
Description: The optional human description of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Definition
Description: The optional definition [text | url] of the quality.

Name: Diagram
Description: The diagram-related information of the piece.

Name: Directory
Description: The optional directory where to find the kit.

Name: Direction
Description: The direction of the port.

Name: Design
Description: A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

Name: Designs
Description: The optional designs of the kit.

Name: Group
Description: The group of the locator.

Name: Homepage
Description: The optional url of the homepage of the kit.

Name: Icon
Description: The optional icon [emoji | text | image | svg] of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Identifier
Description: The local identifier of the {{NAME}} within the {{PARENT_NAME}}.

Name: Identifier
Description: The optional local identifier of the {{NAME}} within the {{PARENT_NAME}}. No id means the default {{NAME}}.

Name: Kit
Description: A kit is a collection of designs that use types.

Name: Locator
Description: A locator is metadata for grouping ports.

Name: Locators
Description: The optional locators of the port.

Name: Level of Detail
Description: The optional Level of Detail/Development/Design (LoD) of the representation. No lod means the default lod.

Name: Name
Description: The name of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Mime
Description: The Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the content of the file of the representation.

Name: Offset
Description: The optional offset distance (in port direction after rotation and tilt) between the connected and the connecting piece.

Name: Origin
Description: The origin of the plane.

Name: Piece
Description: A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

Name: Port
Description: A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

Name: Ports
Description: The ports of the type.

Name: Plane
Description: A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).

Name: Plane
Description: The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

Name: Point
Description: A 3d-point (xyz) of floating point numbers.

Name: Quality
Description: A quality is meta-data for decision making.

Name: Qualities
Description: The optional qualities of the {{NAME}}.

Name: Representation
Description: A representation is a link to a file that describes a type for a certain level of detail and tags.

Name: Rotation
Description: The optional rotation between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

Name: Side
Description: A side of a piece in a connection.

Name: Subgroup
Description: The optional sub-group of the locator. No sub-group means true.

Name: Screen Point
Description: The 2d-point (xy) of integers in screen plane of the center of the icon in the diagram of the piece.

Name: Success
Description: {{NAME}} was successful.

Name: Tags
Description: The optional tags to group representations. No tags means default.

Name: Tilt
Description: The optional tilt (applied after rotation) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

Name: Transform
Description: A 4x4 translation and rotation transformation matrix (no scaling or shearing).

Name: Type
Description: A type is a reusable element that can be connected with other types over ports.

Name: Type
Description: The type-related information of the side.

Name: Types
Description: The optional types of the kit.

Name: Unique Resource Locator
Description: The Unique Resource Locator (URL) to another resource outside of semio.

Name: Unique Resource Locator
Description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit.

Name: Unit
Description: The length unit for all distance-related information of the {{PARENT_NAME}}.

Name: Unit
Description: The optional unit of the value of the quality.

Name: Vector
Description: A 3d-vector (xyz) of floating point numbers.

Name: Validate
Description: Check if the {{NAME}} is valid.

Name: Value
Description: The optional value of the quality. No value is equivalent to true for the name.

Name: Variant
Description: The optional value of the {{NAME}}.

Name: X
Description: The x-coordinate of the screen point.

Name: X
Description: The x-coordinate of the point.

Name: XAxis
Description: The x-axis of the plane.

Name: Y
Description: The y-coordinate of the screen point.

Name: Y
Description: The y-coordinate of the point.

Name: YAxis
Description: The y-axis of the plane.

Name: Z
Description: The z-coordinate of the screen point.

Name: Z
Description: The z-coordinate of the point.
